name: DigiBunnies
description: DigiBunnies is a mix of MEME, NFT and Gaming token on the Polygon blockchain. What makes DigiBunnies special is not only the platform we are developing and WEB3 opportunities it presents for the users , but also the interactive experiences it offers. Users will be able to explore the virtual maps , and unearth/hunt treasures in the different virtual worlds. Users can also engage in entertaining quizzes. Quizzes participants will be rewarded with additional Digibunnies tokens and other prizes. Each DigiBunny class will be distinctive, possessing individual traits, abilities, and limitations. Users can also buy different resources, treasures and gear for their bunnies.
